title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Yigit Koroglu
raw_text: Cover Art  Family Portrait    Yigit Koroglu is a freelance artist focusing on illustration and concept art. He has worked in the video game industry and created illustrations for card games and fantasy books for clients such as Wizards of the Coast, Adultswim, Titmouse, Bushiroad, Bandai Namco, Applibot, Fantasy Flight Games, NGMOCO, and Paizo.
text:
Cover Art
Family Portrait
Yigit Koroglu is a freelance artist focusing on illustration and concept art. He has worked in the video game industry and created illustrations for card games and fantasy books for clients such as Wizards of the Coast, Adultswim, Titmouse, Bushiroad, Bandai Namco, Applibot, Fantasy Flight Games, NGMOCO, and Paizo.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Family Portrait by Yigit Koroglu
